requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: TO BE REFINED
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2060 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: TO BE REFINED

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+ (x86)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does not work with most integrated graphics cards
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 570GT or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Joystick or Xbox 360 Controller highly recommended.

requirements_en.minimum: 4.0.3 and up

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or newer
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9c compatible video card with minimum 512 MB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9c compatible video card with minimum 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
